common.howToInstall: How to install to the home screen?
common.notAllItemsFound: Looks like I haven't collected everything yet...

home.kitchenTableRepeat1: Hmm, who would throw away such a gorgeous table?..
home.kitchenTableRepeat3: Mmm, it looks so tasty... but I still need it.
home.kitchenChairRepeat1: Why is it so small?.. Oh well, I don't have much choice.
home.bedRepeat1: I'll sleep when I finish everything...

bobr.afterBedPickup: Great. I have the minimum to spend the night. Time to head back home.

oldBobr.intro1: Hello, grandson! You finally bought your own hut... Even if it's with a mortgage, you're still doing great!
oldBobr.intro2: It's a bit empty inside... But I saw some furniture nearby while I was walking here. You can look for it.
oldBobr.introRepeat1: I saw some furniture nearby while I was walking here. You can look for it.
oldBobr.introRepeat2: It's a nice day for a walk, don't you think?
oldBobr.introRepeat3: The house won't furnish itself... Time to get to work!
oldBobr.giveLuckyCharm1: Oh, I barely dragged you here... Are you okay?..
oldBobr.giveLuckyCharm2: Ou, I almost forgot! Here, take this for good luck...
oldBobr.giveLuckyCharm3: It's my lucky charm. May it protect you as it once protected me.
oldBobr.respawnInfo1: If something happens to you, I'll always help you get back home.
oldBobr.respawnInfo2: And don't worry about the things you've already collected â€“ they won't be lost!
